item.description:
Our next meeting is on Tuesday May 15th at 7.  No particular agenda but I will report on my results with Frequency Specific Microcurrent treatments.  This is a treatment I would recommend to anyone with Fibromyalgia to relieve their pain.

If anyone wants to try the Lifewave Patches contact me ahead of time and I will pack them in my bag.  You really have to try them before you buy them.  They work almost immediately for pain if they are right for your body. 

See you on Tuesday I hope,

 

Betsu
item.name: Meetup
